Class MPTSGlobalVariables

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--MPTSGlobalVariables
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.event.TextListener
public class MPTSGlobalVariables
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.TextListener

Because of the creation of a window system, a "global variable" class has been created. MPTSGlobalVariables is a class which houses global variables for the duration of the program.

For example...
The MPTS contains a "status bar" at the bottom of the program. This informs the user of which buttons were selected and what actions have been execute or cancelled. This status bar text can be affected by more than one function so it is important that this remains a global variable

See Also:
IPS, SystemWindow

Field Summary
static double NO_TRADING_DAYS_1YEAR
